description: This file defines functions to create Supabase server clients in a Next.js environment, including handling cookies for authentication. It provides a standard client for public use and an admin client with elevated privileges, utilizing environment variables for configuration.

methods.name: export async function createServerClient() { createServerClient
methods.description: Creates a Supabase server client configured with public API keys and cookie management for user sessions.

methods.name: export async function createAdminClient() { createAdminClient
methods.description: Creates a Supabase server client with admin privileges, intended for server-side operations requiring elevated access.

ctags.name: cookieStore
ctags.pattern: /^    const cookieStore = await cookies(); \/\/ must call cookies()$/
